56.author: undefined
56.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

180.htmlString:
This content is plain HTML

This is a HTMLWrapperMorph that allows to embed pure HTML in Lively.

183.comment: A morph that renders arbitrary HTML. Makes integrations of non-morphic content straightforward. Look inside the menu to open an HTML editor or export the content as an HTML document.
